headline: NRG: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: HOUSTON (AP) — NRG Energy Inc. NRG) on Thursday reported net income of $152 million in its third quarter. On a per-share basis, the Houston-based company said it had net income of 69 cents.

headline: NRG Energy, Inc. Reports Third Quarter Results, Reaffirms 2025 Financial Guidance, and Initiates 2026 Standalone Guidance
summary: HOUSTON, November 06, 2025--NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE: NRG) today announces financial results for the third quarter ended September 30, 2025, and reports GAAP Net Income of $152 million, GAAP Earnings per Share (EPS) — basic of $0.70, and GAAP Cash Provided by Operating Activities of $484 million. The Company's non-GAAP metrics are Adjusted Net Income of $537 million, Adjusted EPS of $2.78, Adjusted EBITDA of $1,205 million, and Free Cash Flow before Growth Investments (FCFbG) of $828 million for t
